sentences.en: Abby used to come home every other day with a bump or a bruise.
sentences.cn: 艾比以前隔天就会带着撞伤或者擦伤回家.

sentences.en: Be sure to store them carefully as they bruise easily.
sentences.cn: 小心存放，因为它们很容易被碰伤。

sentences.en: David continued to bruise his face; Faber replied with a series of body jabs.
sentences.cn: 大卫连续击费伯的脸, 费伯报答他的也是一顿拳头.

sentences.en: Don't drop apples, they bruise easily.
sentences.cn: 苹果易碰伤,要小心轻放.

sentences.en: Don't drop the peaches they bruise easily.
sentences.cn: 桃儿容易碰伤--要轻拿轻放.

sentences.en: He fell from his bike and got bruise in his knee.
sentences.cn: 他从自行车上跌下来,擦伤了膝盖.

sentences.en: He had a bruise just below his left eye.
sentences.cn: 他有个伤疤正好在他左眼的下侧.

sentences.en: He had a bruise just below his right eye.
sentences.cn: 就在他的右眼下面有一块伤痕.

sentences.en: He is covered in bruise after falling off his bicycle.
sentences.cn: 他从自行车上　下来,满身青一块、紫一块.

sentences.en: How did you get that bruise on your cheek?
sentences.cn: 你脸上的淤伤是怎么搞的？

sentences.en: She fell off her bike and bruised her knee.
sentences.cn: 她从自行车上摔下来，擦伤了膝盖。

sentences.en: So the bruise is supposed to be a good thing?
Some people bruise more easily than others.
sentences.cn: 有些人比其他人更容易被碰伤。

sentences.en: The bruise on his stomach ached with a steady throb.
sentences.cn: 他腹部的擦伤一直阵阵作痛。

sentences.en: The bruise was caused by a kick.
The rupture of a blood vessel usually cause the mark of a bruise.
sentences.cn: 血管的突然破裂往往会造成外伤的痕迹.

trans.tran_en: a purple or brown mark on your skin that you get because you have fallen, been hit etc
if part of your body bruises, or if you bruise part of your body, it gets hit or hurt and a bruise appears

trans.tran_cn: 打青， 使受淤伤； 挫伤， 伤害
trans.tran_en: to affect someone badly and make them feel less confident
